thread.title: Netflix's Stranger Things returns with season two this Halloween
thread.title_full: Netflix's Stranger Things returns with season two this Halloween

author: Abhimanyu Ghoshal
title: Netflix's Stranger Things returns with season two this Halloween
text:
24 shares 
Netflix’s excellent series Stranger Things , which ran its entire first season last July, stole hearts with its lovable characters and nostalgic 80s setting, and snagged the SAG award for drama ensemble out of the clutches out of heavyweight rivals like Game of Thrones and Westworld last month. 
The show finally has some good news for fans: In its Super Bowl commercial, it revealed that it’ll return with season two on Halloween.
